metadata.summary: Build private collection of observed executables for analysis, YARA scanning, and threat hunting across your environment
metadata.primary_use_case: Track and analyze all executables observed in environment to identify malicious binaries and enrich detections

extracted_apis.description: Check if hash (MD5/SHA1/SHA256) has been observed in organization
Get download URL for binary file associated with hash
Retrieve metadata including signing details, file type, and hashes for observed binary
Search binary library by imp_hash, company name, file description, signature, size, or type
Add tags to hash for classification within binary library
